description: This file declares the interface for the CCSP Message Bus Service, including function prototypes for initialization, finalization, signal sending, and message handling related to the message bus in an embedded Linux environment.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Initializes message bus interface and registers the Dbus path using component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Implements interface used only by pnm for initialization with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Implements interface used only by pnm for cleanup with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks message bus status, used only by pnm.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources with specified priority for pnm.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating a parameter value change.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_SendTransferCompleteSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating transfer completion.

methods.name: CcspPandM_path_message_func
methods.description: Callback function invoked upon receiving a message on the registered Dbus path.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_RegisterToCR
methods.description: Registers the interface to the Configuration Repository with the given parameter array.
